=== Contributions ===

I have been member of <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-l10n-ko|Ubuntu Korean Translator]]</nowiki> since September 2014, and was appointed as an admin of localization team since March 2015, and served as an owner for two years. Since then, I became interested in triaging bugs.
